# CAM::SET_CAM_DEATH_FAIL_EFFECT_STATE

## Summary
Pushes the death/fail camera effect through its states. You must ensure this is reset to CAM_DEATH_FAIL_EFFECT_INACTIVE once the sequence is complete.

## Parameters
* **CAM_DEATH_FAIL_EFFECT_STATE** state:
The desired state to apply.
See the definition of CAM_DEATH_FAIL_EFFECT_STATE for a list of valid states.

## Description
<!-- AUTOGENERATED: Remove this line before editing -->
if p0 is 0, effect is cancelled

if p0 is 1, effect zooms in, gradually tilts cam clockwise apx 30 degrees, wobbles slowly. Motion blur is active until cancelled.

if p0 is 2, effect immediately tilts cam clockwise apx 30 degrees, begins to wobble slowly, then gradually tilts cam back to normal. The wobbling will continue until the effect is cancelled.
